title: Spoiled Brats
writer: Gary Alazraki, Nicolas Cuche, Patricio Saiz
short_cast: Gérard Jugnot, Camille Lou, Artus, Louka Meliava, Tom Leeb, François Morel, Joffrey Verbruggen
cast: Gérard Jugnot, Camille Lou, Artus, Louka Meliava, Tom Leeb, François Morel, Joffrey Verbruggen
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: Three spoiled siblings are forced to earn their livings after their wealthy and well-meaning father pretends he's lost everything to teach them a lesson.
